title: Apple Online Store Fraud Investigator - Strategic Data Solutions
summary: Apple is seeking an individual with excellent analytical and research skills to join the Strategic Data Solutions team as an Apple Store Online Fraud Investigator in Yokohama, Japan.
description: On this team, tasks involve reviewing and analyzing purchase transactions, detecting unauthorized activity, obtaining additional information through customer outreach, determining appropriate next steps on fraudulent orders, and resolving suspected fraud escalations from various sources.
preferred_qualifications: Excellent analytics, problem-solving skills, good logical thinking, customer-focused mindset, comfort with large and complex data, sound decision-making, ability to work in high-stress environments, and more.
